record.id: field.name="field.name" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: field.name
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: The name of a field in a particular logical file to validate.
You can only specify simple fields (character, number, date/time and logical) in the Validity table.
Fields with a data type of structure, expression, or array are not allowed. If you specify an invalid field type, Service Manager opens a prompt displaying all allowable field types.

detail.detail: Service Manager validates this value against the dbdict table whenever it adds or updates a Validity table record.
